publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-759 Brian Adam: Ian Watt, Aberdeen Music School—That the Parliament congratulates Ian Watt, a pupil of the Aberdeen Music School, for his great achievement in reaching the finals of the new BBC Classical Star competition and further congratulates the school for its sterling work in helping the young people of the area in developing their talents.

S3M-759 Brian Adam: Ian Watt, Aberdeen Music School—That the Parliament congratulates Ian Watt, a pupil of the Aberdeen Music School, for his great achievement in reaching the finals of the new BBC Classical Star competition and further congratulates the school for its sterling work in helping the young people of the area in developing their talents.
S3M-759 Ian Watt, Aberdeen Music School (lodged on 1 November 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Michael Matheson*
